(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP It))
    (VP (VBZ 's)
      (VP
        (VP (VBN been)
          (NP (DT a) (NN year))
          (SBAR (IN since)
            (S
              (NP (PRP I))
              (ADVP (RB first))
              (VP (VBD met)
                (NP (NNP Liverpool))))))
        (CC and)
        (VP (VBN blogged)
          (PP (IN about)
            (NP
              (NP (PRP$ his) (NN Ciabatta))
              (CC and)
              (NP (NNP Kaya) (NNP Toast)))))))
    (. .)))


nsubjpass(year-5, It-1)
auxpass(year-5, 's-2)
cop(year-5, been-3)
det(year-5, a-4)
root(ROOT-0, year-5)
mark(met-9, since-6)
nsubj(met-9, I-7)
advmod(met-9, first-8)
advcl(year-5, met-9)
dobj(met-9, Liverpool-10)
cc(year-5, and-11)
conj(year-5, blogged-12)
prep(blogged-12, about-13)
poss(Ciabatta-15, his-14)
pobj(about-13, Ciabatta-15)
cc(Ciabatta-15, and-16)
nn(Toast-18, Kaya-17)
conj(Ciabatta-15, Toast-18)

    (NP (NN time) (NNS flies))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP we))
    (VP (VBP have)
      (VP (VBN been)
        (VP (VBG tossing)
          (PP (IN around)
            (NP
              (NP (NNS ideas))
              (SBAR
                (WHPP (IN on)
                  (WHNP (WP what) (RB else)))
                (S
                  (VP (MD would)
                    (VP (VB Singaporeans)
                      (SBAR (IN like)
                        (S
                          (S
                            (VP (TO to)
                              (VP (VB eat)
                                (PP (IN with)
                                  (NP (PRP$ their) (NNP Kopi))))))
                          (CC and)
                          (S
                            (NP (NNP Teh) (NNP C.))
                            (SBAR (IN If)
                              (S
                                (NP (PRP you))
                                (ADVP (DT all))
                                (VP (VBP have)
                                  (VP (VBN been)
                                    (VP (VBG following)
                                      (NP (DT the) (NN blog)))))))))))))))))))
    (, ,)))

pobj(with-15, Kopi-17)
cc(eat-14, and-18)

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (EX There))
    (VP (VBP have)
      (VP (VBN been)
        (NP
          (NP
            (ADJP (RB so) (JJ many))
            (NNS occasions))
          (SBAR
            (WHADVP (WRB when))
            (S
              (NP (PRP I))
              (VP (VBP am)
                (VP (VBG having)
                  (NP (NNP Cheesecake)
                    (CC or)
                    (NNP Croissant))
                  (SBAR (IN that)
                    (S
                      (NP (PRP I))
                      (VP (VBD wished)
                        (SBAR
                          (S
                            (NP (PRP I))
                            (VP (MD could)
                              (VP (VB have)
                                (NP
                                  (NP
                                    (NP (DT a) (NN cup))
                                    (PP (IN of)
                                      (NP (NNP Kopi))))
                                  (CONJP (RB rather) (IN than))
                                  (NP (DT a) (NNP Cappuccino)))))))))))))))))
    (. .)))

cop(occasions-6, been-3)

ccomp(having-10, wished-16)

aux(have-19, could-18)
ccomp(wished-16, have-19)

            (PP (IN of)
              (NP (NN stuff))))

poss(friend-17, my-16)
advcl(promote-10, friend-17)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBP like)
      (NP (PRP$ his) (NNP Kopi))
      (SBAR (IN because)
        (S
          (NP (PRP it))
          (VP (VBZ is)
            (ADJP (JJ smooth))))))
    (, ,)))

root(ROOT-0, like-2)
poss(Kopi-4, his-3)
dobj(like-2, Kopi-4)
mark(smooth-8, because-5)
nsubj(smooth-8, it-6)
cop(smooth-8, is-7)
advcl(like-2, smooth-8)


(ROOT
  (NP
    (NP (NN creamy)
      (CC and)
      (NN fragrant))
    (PP (IN with)
      (NP
        (ADJP (RB very) (JJ little))
        (NN bitterness)
        (CC or)
        (NN acidity)))
    (. .)))

prep(creamy-1, with-4)

cc(bitterness-7, or-8)
conj(bitterness-7, acidity-9)

        (SBAR

              (NP (PRP it)))))))
    (. .)))

(ROOT
  (S (CC but)
    (NP (PRP you))
    (VP (MD can)
      (VP (VB ask)
        (NP
          (NP (DT any))
          (PP (IN of)
            (NP
              (NP (DT the) (`` ``) (NNP Uncles) ('' ''))
              (VP (VBG sitting)
                (PP (IN around)
                  (SBAR
                    (WHNP (WP who))
                    (S
                      (VP (VBP come)
                        (NP
                          (NP
                            (QP (CD three) (NNS times)))
                          (NP (DT a) (NN day)))
                        (S
                          (VP (TO to)
                            (VP (VB get)
                              (NP (PRP$ their) (NNP Kopi) (NN fix)))))))))))))))
    (. !)))


cc(ask-4, but-1)
nsubj(ask-4, you-2)
aux(ask-4, can-3)
root(ROOT-0, ask-4)
dobj(ask-4, any-5)
prep(any-5, of-6)
det(Uncles-9, the-7)
pobj(of-6, Uncles-9)
partmod(Uncles-9, sitting-11)
prep(sitting-11, around-12)
nsubj(come-14, who-13)
pcomp(around-12, come-14)
number(times-16, three-15)
dobj(come-14, times-16)
det(day-18, a-17)
dep(times-16, day-18)
aux(get-20, to-19)
xcomp(come-14, get-20)
poss(fix-23, their-21)
nn(fix-23, Kopi-22)
dobj(get-20, fix-23)


(ROOT
  (NP
    (NP
      (NP (RB Only) (NN place))
      (PP (IN in)
        (NP (NNP Singapore)))
      (SBAR
        (S
          (NP (PRP I))
          (VP (VBP know)))))
    (PP (IN of)
      (SBAR (IN that)
        (S
          (NP (PRP you))
          (VP (MD can)
            (VP (VB get)
              (NP (RB freshly) (JJ baked) (NNS scones))
              (PP (IN with)
                (NP (NNP Kopi)
                  (CC and)
                  (NNP Teh) (NNP C.))))))))))

    (NP (PRP you))

          (CC and)
          (VP (VB see)
            (SBAR (IN if)
              (S
                (NP (PRP you))

    (. .)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (NNP Business))
    (VP (MD should)
      (VP (VB start)
        (NP (JJ next) (NN month))))
    (. .)))
